function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential transmission of aerosols in air-conditioned spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Indoor spread of infectious diseases by the conditions of hvac systems.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential health risk of respiratory virus transmission in air-conditioned rooms.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Control of indoor temperature and humidity during the epidemic period.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of covid-19 in restaurant settings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective air filtration and aerosol exposure","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of evidence for cost-efficient interventions for indoor transmission of respiratory infections","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Recycled air in ventilation and air conditioning systems can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate airflow and ventilation in indoor spaces can lead to poor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate control of airflow and airspeed can lead to the transport of virus-carrying particles within indoor spaces.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate control of pressure differences between zones in the building.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation of spaces with outdoor air.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate use of uv-c for air transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inappropriate temperature and humidity setpoints leading to discomfort and potential health quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of regular inspection and maintenance of water seals leading to potential water leaks and ventilation systems contributing to the spread of covid-19 and other respiratory infections","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Aerosol transmission in enclosed spaces may occur due
